name: @ovidiupw/simfuelplan
description: Helps flight simulator pilots compute the fuel requirements for their trip

scripts.copy-all-assets: npm run copy-views && npm run copy-public && npm run copy-bin &&  npm run copy-routes
scripts.restart:dev: forever stop dist/bin/www.js && forever start dist/bin/www.js
scripts.start:dev: forever start dist/bin/www.js || npm run restart:dev
scripts.dev: watch "npm run copy-all-assets && npm run check-standard-js && npm run build:dev && npm run start:dev" bin routes views public
scripts.start: npm run copy-all-assets && (node dist/bin/www.js || (forever stop dist/bin/www.js && node dist/bin/www.js))
scripts.start-check-and-stop: npm run copy-all-assets && forever start dist/bin/www.js && curl --retry 5 -v localhost:3000 && forever stop dist/bin/www.js
scripts.check-release: npm install && del-cli ./node_modules/** ./dist/** && npm install && npm run test && npm run test && npm run test-with-coverage && npm run start-check-and-stop

author: ovidiupw
